textBlocks.providerBlock1: We’ve found your health records at the following organizations. Please double check that you’ve visited each organization before proceeding.
textBlocks.confirmationBlock1: Thanks for confirming where you've received care.
textBlocks.confirmationBlock2: Do you agree to have your records sent to Mass Mutual to process your application?
textBlocks.successBlock1: Thank you for sending your records. We will contact you as soon as the application is processed.

errorMsgs.confirmation1: You must agree in order to submit records.
